description: Implement a 'zeit check-update' CLI command that checks GitHub releases for newer versions. It should fetch the latest release from the GitHub API (repo: the zeit repository), compare the version tag against the current app version, and inform the user if an update is available with a download link. Use URLSession for the HTTP request. Add the command as a subcommand of the root ZeitCLI in ZeitCLI.swift.
Allow users to list and describe their activity types. This feature requires doing it as part of the app onboarding, after setting up the permissions.
